Package Election

Class Candidate

java.lang.Object
Election.Candidate
public class Candidate extends Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Candidate(String name)
    Constructs a new candidate with only a name specified, no party affiliation.
    Candidate(String name, Party party)
    Constructs a new candidate with the specified name and party affiliation.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addSeats()
    Adds a seat to the candidate's total seat count.
    void
    addVote()
    Increments the vote count for this candidate by one.
    void

    Allocates a seat to this candidate, marking them as having at least one seat.

  • Constructor Details

    • Candidate

      public Candidate(String name, Party party)
      Constructs a new candidate with the specified name and party affiliation. The candidate starts with zero votes and no seats.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the candidate
      party - the party to which the candidate belongs

    • Candidate

      public Candidate(String name)
      Constructs a new candidate with only a name specified, no party affiliation. The candidate starts with zero votes and no seats.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the candidate

  • Method Details

    • allocateSeat

      public void allocateSeat()
      Allocates a seat to this candidate, marking them as having at least one seat.

    • hasSeats

      public boolean hasSeats()
      Checks if the candidate has any seats.
      Returns:
      true if the candidate has at least one seat, false otherwise

    • setVotes

      public void setVotes(int votes)
      Sets the number of votes for this candidate.
      Parameters:
      votes - the number of votes to set

    • addVote

      public void addVote()
      Increments the vote count for this candidate by one.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns the name of the candidate.
      Returns:
      the name of the candidate

    • getParty

      public Party getParty()
      Returns the party affiliation of the candidate.
      Returns:
      the party of the candidate

    • getVotes

      public int getVotes()
      Returns the total number of votes received by the candidate.
      Returns:
      the number of votes

    • setSeats

      public void setSeats(int seats)
      Sets the number of seats assigned to this candidate.
      Parameters:
      seats - the number of seats to set

    • getSeats

      public int getSeats()
      Returns the total number of seats allocated to this candidate.
      Returns:
      the number of seats

    • addSeats

      public void addSeats()
      Adds a seat to the candidate's total seat count.
